entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking under the sink and picking up a book. He is also described as laughing at Ron's concerns about the book being dangerous.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as holding Harry back from picking up the book and expressing concern that it could be dangerous.

entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is mentioned as pointing under the sink where the small, thin book was found.

entities.name: the ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as having confiscated some books that were considered dangerous.

relationships.description: Ron held Harry back from picking up the book.
Harry is related to The Ministry through Ron's mention of a book that was confiscated by The Ministry.
